task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions to use the addition feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers, you must know what is addition.

context.p: Use this task to add two numbers using the addition feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: If you want to add 2 to 3, the equation will look like 2+3=5. The result 5 appears on the screen.
